entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 11:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -13.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
